mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_BASIC_TBL (od_number, us_id, od_name, od_phone, od_postcode, od_addr_basic, od_addr_detail, od_total_price, od_pay_date, od_status, pm_status) VALUES ( #{od_number}, #{us_id}, #{od_name}, #{od_phone}, #{od_postcode}, #{od_addr_basic}, #{od_addr_detail}, #{od_total_price}, sysdate, #{od_status}, #{pm_status} )

INSERT INTO ORDER_DETAIL_TBL (od_number, pd_number, od_amount, od_price) SELECT #{od_number}, c.pd_number, c.ct_amount, p.pd_price FROM CART_TABLE C INNER JOIN PRODUCT_TABLE P ON C.PD_NUMBER = P.PD_NUMBER WHERE us_id = #{us_id}
